channel.title: I need a bit of help please

item.title: I need a bit of help please
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

That doesn’t work. ^

I get this too and every time I re-open the compiler.bat or runserver.bat and like 3 people log in it does the same thing.

moomoo22 - You get this when you have a well… ‘Java heap space’ lol. So when it has too many people and you get this and crashes server. Either you need a new source. Or your computer can’t hold that many people. I know when I get this , I just stopped running my server, and didn’t even bother fixing. I know it isn’t my computer because my computer is new and fast. So if you don’t want to stop your server, then I suggest getting a new source and starting from there or try this.

Steps:

  1. Right-click runserver.bat > edit
  2. Where it says something like:-Xmx500m Maybe try editing the ‘500’ to 1000 or something. Or search like ‘-xmx’ in a file.

Sorry if I couldn’t help but I hope you understand what I am saying.

Read full topic
item.source: I need a bit of help please
